title: doblezero

content: Hello everybody Today I bring you 2 magazines and 2 comics, and also a rare Krypto keepsafes (not for sale on the web) from stellar signed by the creator. and Alpen Coin Custom BuyerFunded 2021 + poker chip created and signed by MrCryptHODL. Tickets:1 - ¬† ¬† YodasRedRocket  (paid)2 - aoluain (paid)3 - minerjones (paid)4 -  ¬†Dernoste ¬†  (paid)5 - aoluain (paid)6 -  ¬†Dernoste ¬†  (paid)7 - Cryptogreatdane (paid)8 - minerjones (paid)9 - aoluain (paid)0 -  JanEmil (paid)a - ¬† ¬† YodasRedRocket  (paid)b - aoluain (paid)c - ¬† JanEmil (paid)d - Cryptogreatdane (paid)e - Cryptogreatdane (paid)¬†f - aoluain (paid)Information Price Per Ticket:  Ticket Limit: There is no limit, you can buy whatever you want Shipping:  Shipping costs includedPayment BTC:  3AHh9ZnidpQ5pJ48LZ4GqHRL6sJivAkV6X ¬† ¬†How To Play1. choose one or more available slots2. PM or post a reply with your pick(s) + the txID of your transaction. 3. once all tickets are paid we'll select a block number. 4. The last character in the hash of that block will decide the winner! I hope you like it, good luck to everyone who wants to participate!
